attributes.additional_details:
MP should not be allowed to claim expenses, I feel that it is a waste of our tax money which could be spent on better things.
MPs should be allowed fuel costs within in London but if you have to commute in then you should pay the expenses yourself.
Most of the UK work force do not receive the same priviledges and I think it time that it was stopped.
If you choose to accept a job then your expenses should come out of youe salary just like the TAX payers
